DROP TABLE players;

CREATE TABLE players(
id BIGSERIAL NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
level INT NOT NULL,
exp INT NOT NULL,
job INT NOT NULL,
max_hp INT NOT NULL,
hp INT NOT NULL,
max_mp INT NOT NULL,
mp INT NOT NULL,
money INT NOT NULL,
inv_equip BYTEA,
inv_use BYTEA,
inv_setup BYTEA,
inv_etc BYTEA,
inv_cash BYTEA,
equips_char BYTEA,
stats_alloc BYTEA,
skills_alloc BYTEA,
player_state BYTEA,
quests_in_prog BYTEA,
quests_done BYTEA);

INSERT INTO players (name, level, exp, job, max_hp, hp, max_mp, mp, money, inv_equip, inv_use,inv_setup, inv_etc, inv_cash, equips_char, stats_alloc, skills_alloc, player_state, quests_in_prog, quests_done)
VALUES ('ChrisSinatra', 10, 0, 0, 430, 400, 200, 199, 5000, E'\\x68000200000000000000000000000300000002000000000000000500000000000000000000000500000006000000000000
000000000006000000010000000400000002000000000000000500000000000000000000000700000006000000000000000000000008000000', E'\\x08000000000000000000', E'\\x08000000000000000000', E'\\x08000000000000000000', E'\\x08000000000000000000', E'\\x08000000000000000000', E'\\x1800040000000000000005000000010000000300000002000000', E'\\x500009000000000000009a0200001400000000000000010000000100000001000000020000000100000005000000010000000600000001000000070000000100000008000000010000000900000001000000', E'\\x08000000000000000000', E'\\x08000000000000000000', E'\\x08000000000000000000');
INSERT INTO players (name, level, exp, job, max_hp, hp, max_mp, mp, money, inv_equip, inv_use,inv_setup, inv_etc, inv_cash, equips_char, stats_alloc, skills_alloc, player_state, quests_in_prog, quests_done)
VALUES ('GusBreaux', 10, 0, 0, 430, 400, 200, 199, 3000, E'\\x100001000000000000000100000001000000', E'\\x08000000000000000000', E'\\x08000000000000000000', E'\\x08000000000000000000', E'\\x08000000000000000000', E'\\x08000000000000000000', E'\\x1800040000000000000004000000020000000100000005000000', E'\\x400007000000000000009a02000014000000000000000100000001000000010000000200000001000000050000000100000006000000010000000700000001000000', E'\\x08000000000000000000', E'\\x08000000000000000000', E'\\x08000000000000000000');
